course_title: Aboriginal People and Public Health: Ethics, Policy, and Practice

sections.comments: Course is delivered entirely online.  To access, please log on to UBC Canvas at www.canvas.ubc.caPlease note, because of DL course-conflict scheduling issues, please double check to make sure this course does not conflict with any of the other courses you have registered in this term.

description: Experience of colonization; Indian Act; the histories and intergenerational impact of the residential school; child-welfare systems; communicable disease prevention; the challenge of ethical public health practice; and traditional healing.
